name: Strange Lands (itch)
description:
Strange Lands is a fun, light, old-school platformer with a few modern twists. With a style and simplicity reminiscent of the classics, Strange Lands delivers an escape to worlds beyond our own. Join Sarah as she fights her way past untold dangers and numerous challenges.

Strange Lands is currently in active development.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: Move
  • Space bar: Jump
  • Z: Fire/Throw

Game controllers also supported
